title: Garin Nugroho: my family, my film and my nation
creator_contributor_role: S E T Film Workshop, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indonesia - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: Garin Nugroho narrates this collage of his own documentaries and films. He talks about the films and how he associates them with his personal life. There are clips from his feature 'Letter for an Angel' and documentaries 'Water and Romi' and 'Tale of a Mousedeer' which inspired the feature 'Leaf on a Pillow'. Nugroho also articulates his concerns for the failing condition of his country. In Bahasa Indonesia with English subtitles.
